name: Murmur (cephalopodunk)
description:
You are just a zephyr, the gentlest of breezes.

You are in love with the aurora, but she is shy, and hides while there are other lights in the sky.

But maybe this flock of dark-winged birds can help.

Still in BETA - let me know if you hit problems

Actual Instructions
  • Extinguish the lights by driving birds through them.
  • Hold down the mouse button to create a breeze.
  • Birds will avoid the wind - use that to chivvy them about
  • Birds near other birds will form flocks which can be moved together
  • Loops, slashes and curves are most effective - don't get to close or the birds will scatter.
  • Other things:
    • Clouds - scatter flocks.
    • Stars - birds hate stars (because astrology).
    • Fireflies - birds love fireflies.
